Room.Name: Tiamat Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Tiamat Lane, north of the Kista Towers.
Room.LongDescription: The Towers soar far into the clouds over your head, making you feel like a country bumpkin as you tilt your head back to look. But the Towers are impressive! On the north side of the street you see a fellowship hall for members of the Royal Order of Trackers and Rangers.
